C

ChangeAnnuaireFileAction - Class in events
Action triggered when the user has or wants to change the address book path
ChangeAnnuaireFileAction(AddressBook) - Constructor for class events.ChangeAnnuaireFileAction
Instantiates a new Change annuaire file action.
ChangeLangAction - Class in events
Action triggered when the user changes the app language
ChangeLangAction(AddressBook, Locale) - Constructor for class events.ChangeLangAction
Instantiates a new Change lang action.
changeLocale(Locale) - Method in class base.AddressBook
Change locale.
chooseAnnuairePath() - Method in class base.AddressBook
Show the user a dialog to choose the directory where the address book will be saved
chooseContact(String) - Method in class base.AddressBook
Triggered when the selected contact changes ; and call method to display its informations
chooseContactByLocation(Point) - Method in class base.AddressBook
Choose contact given the mouse location
CloseAction - Class in events
Action triggered on app exit
CloseAction(AddressBook) - Constructor for class events.CloseAction
Instantiates a new Close action.
ContactModel - Class in base
Customized DefaultListModel to handle contacts loading & sorting
ContactModel(Properties) - Constructor for class base.ContactModel
Instantiates a new Contact model.
contacts - Variable in class base.AddressBook
Properties containing the contact name & contact details
contactsJList - Variable in class base.AddressBook
JList containing contacts name
contactsNameList - Variable in class base.AddressBook
Model linked to the JList containing contacts name
ContextMenuAction - Class in events
Action triggered when the user right-clicks on the contacts list
ContextMenuAction(AddressBook) - Constructor for class events.ContextMenuAction
Instantiates a new Context menu action.
